briefdescription.para: A pointer to a RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Window object whose surface is going to be rendered to.
A pointer to a RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Camera object whose matrices will be used for rendering.
Stores the physical device (GPU).
A unique Vulkan instance.
The debug messenger for logging validation messages.
The surface containing surface parameters.
A unique Vulkan logical device for interfacing the physical device.
A single unique Vulkan command pool for graphics queue operations.
A single unique Vulkan command pool for transfer queue operations.
A vector of fences for synchronizing images that are in flight.
In flight fences used for synchronization.
All semaphores for signaling that a particular swapchain image is available.
All semaphores for signaling that a render operation has finished.
Descriptors for ray-tracing-related data ( no equivalent in rasterization shader ).
Descriptors for scene-related data in ray tracing.
Descriptors for scene-related data in rasterization.
Descriptors for vertex data.
Descriptors for index data.
Descriptor sets for ray tracing-related data.
Descriptor sets for scene-related data in rasterization shaders.
Descriptor sets for scene-related data in ray tracing shaders.
Descriptor sets for vertex data.
Descriptor sets for index data.
Descriptor buffer infos for the vertex data.
Descriptor buffer infos for the index data.
Multiple buffers for vertices because of variable descriptor indexing.
Multiple buffers for indices because of variable descriptor indexing.
Multiple buffers for meshes because of variable descriptor indexing.
A storage buffer for the ray tracing instances.
A storage buffer for directional light data.
A storage buffer for point light data.
UBO for camera data.
Uniform buffers containing camera data.
A RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Swapchain to manage swapchain related operations.
A RAYEX_NAMESPACE::RenderPass to create, begin and end a render pass.
A RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Pipeline for managing a rasterization pipeline.
A RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Pipeline for managing a ray tracing pipeline.
A RAYEX_NAMESPACE::CommandBuffer containing as many command buffers as there are images in the swapchain.
A pointer to a RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Gui object that will be used for rendering the GUI.
The RAYEX_NAMESPACE::RayTracingBuilder for setting up all ray tracing-related structures and the ray tracing process itself.
The application's viewport.
The application's scissor.
Keeps track of whether or not the swapchain needs to be re-created.
Keeps track of whether or not the graphics pipelines are ready.
Refers to the rendering settings stored in Rayex::settings.
Refers to the scene stored in Rayex::scene.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to a window object that the API will use to display an image.
A pointer to a camera object that will be used to "capture" the scene.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the GUI that will be used.

detaileddescription.para:
The GUI can be changed at runtime. This enables the user to swap between different pre-built GUIs on the fly.
gui
A pointer to a GUI object that will be rendered on top of the final image.
initialize
If true, the GUI object will be initialized (false if not specified).

briefdescription.para: Initializes all universal Vulkan objects.
Initializes all Vulkan objects that are scene-specific.
Used to update and upload uniform buffers.
Retrieves an image from the swapchain and presents it.
Re-initializes the render pass to support the GUI and initializes the GUI itself.
Updates both top and bottom level acceleration structures as well as their descriptor bindings.
Initilializes a rasterization as well as a graphics pipeline.

xrefdescription.para: This function will be pointless once the new pipeline system is implemented.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the render pass with a color and depth attachment.
Records commands to the swapchain command buffers that will be used for rendering.

xrefdescription.para: Rasterization has been removed for now. Might want to re-add rasterization support with RT-compatible shaders again.

briefdescription.para: Creates all fences and semaphores required to sync the rendering process.
Creates a descriptor set layout for each the ray tracing components and the models.
Updates scene descriptors for camera, lights and ray tracing instances.
Updates the descriptor set with bindings to the total vertices and total indices buffers.
Handles swapchain and pipeline recreations triggered by the user using setters provided in RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Settings.
Updates all uniform buffers light light sources.
Recreates the swapchain and re-records the swapchain command buffers.
Acquires the next image from the swapchain.
Submits the swapchain command buffers to a queue and presents an image on the screen.
Records rasterization draw calls to the swapchain command buffers.
Records ray tracing calls to the swapchain command buffers.
Initializes and owns all Vulkan components and displays a picture on the screen.

simplesect.para: All API components and resources are freed using scope-bound destruction.
Because of scope-bound destruction it is required to pay close attention to the order of resource allocations done by the user.
